lead_paragraph: Captain Griest, who graduated from the Army’s elite Ranger school, confronts the last bastion of traditionally male combat roles.

headline.print_headline: Army Captain to Become First Female Officer Trained to Lead Troops in Combat
headline.main: Kristen Griest on Course to Become First Female Army Officer Trained to Lead Troops Into Combat

snippet: Captain Griest, who graduated from the Army’s elite Ranger school, confronts the last bastion of traditionally male combat roles.
abstract: Capt Kristen Griest graduates from Army's Ranger school, completing grueling Maneuver Captains Career Course at Fort Benning, Ga, and becoming first female United States service member qualified to lead infantry unit in combat.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
